name: Station Terminal E54-S
description:
You have connected remotely to an unknown terminal, you will have to search to uncover what story there may be to the world this terminal resides in.

This game was made as a prototype to see if a story with no real objective could be something interesting for people to play, if so, I may go somewhere with this idea.

HINT:

To get you started, try typing the name of the terminal
